description: Unsure of what the day’s mission has in store? Reach for the Rush Mid GTX, our brand new, do-it-all trail shoe. The Rush Mid GTX features the same innovative Freedome™ IKS™ outsole as it’s trail running sibling, the Rush, providing confidence-inspiring traction and stability for whatever the day has in store. The all-synthetic upper is light and nimble while still providing dynamic support, and offers waterproof-breathable protection via a GORE-TEX® Extended Comfort lining.
name: Scarpa Rush Mid GTX - Mens
